entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Trump has no care for the elderly. His only concern is pumping the stock market b/c he falsely believes that inflated stock prices is a sign of a strong economy. It's not. Trump's Covid19 total failure cannot be erased by an unsustainable stock market.
